Elemental Eruption.name: Elemental Eruption
Elemental Eruption.fullText:
Element Unchained Attack 11Elemental Eruption

You disappear into a burst of energy and reform elsewhere.

Encounter        Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Psychic, Teleportation
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Primary ability + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Primary ability + 9 vs. Reflex

Hit: 2d8 + primary ability modifier acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, and psychic damage.

Effect: You teleport to any square in the burst or any square adjacent to the burst.


Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
Elemental Eruption.flavor: You disappear into a burst of energy and reform elsewhere.
keywords: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Psychic, Teleportation
Elemental Eruption.attack:
Primary ability + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Primary ability + 9 vs. Reflex
Elemental Eruption.onHit: 2d8 + primary ability modifier acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, and psychic damage.
Elemental Eruption.effect: You teleport to any square in the burst or any square adjacent to the burst.

Duplicate Escape.name: Duplicate Escape
Duplicate Escape.fullText:
Element Unchained Attack 20Duplicate Escape

The elements that compose you are everywhere, and you manipulate them into simulacra of you to confound your enemies.

Daily        Conjuration, Teleportation
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Effect: You conjure a duplicate of you in up to 4 squares in the burst. Each duplicate makes a single-target at-will ranged or melee attack against a different creature using your basic attack. A duplicate lasts until the end of your next turn, is indistinguishable from you, and can be attacked. A duplicate that takes damage is destroyed.

Sustain Minor: You and any one duplicate can teleport, swapping places, then each duplicate moves your speed. In addition, the duplicates persist until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
Duplicate Escape.flavor: The elements that compose you are everywhere, and you manipulate them into simulacra of you to confound your enemies.
Duplicate Escape.effect: You conjure a duplicate of you in up to 4 squares in the burst. A duplicate lasts until the end of your next turn, is indistinguishable from you, and can be attacked. A duplicate that takes damage is destroyed.

Elemental Transposition.name: Elemental Transposition
Elemental Transposition.fullText:
Element Unchained Utility 12Elemental Transposition

You dissipate into your constituent elements, reforming once danger is past.

Encounter        Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Effect: The burst creates a lightly obscured zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You are removed from play until the start of your next turn, when you return to a square within the zone.


Published in Dragon Magazine 391.
Elemental Transposition.flavor: You dissipate into your constituent elements, reforming once danger is past.
Elemental Transposition.effect: The burst creates a lightly obscured zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. You are removed from play until the start of your next turn, when you return to a square within the zone.
